body_html:
@QQRider Your error message is different.
Yours is actually a failure due to your code.
CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY means, well, you are out of GPU memory, as it suggests.
You are allocating 5.92 GBs of GPU memory, and it fails as there is not enough memory on your GPU.
Please reach out to stackoverflow if you need more help with that.

body:
@QQRider Your error message is different.
Yours is actually a failure due to your code.
`CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY` means, well, you are out of GPU memory, as it suggests.
You are allocating 5.92 GBs of GPU memory, and it fails as there is not enough memory on your GPU.
Please reach out to stackoverflow if you need more help with that.
